sentences.sContent: Women are too often constrained by family commitments and by low expectations.
sentences.sCn: 女性往往受家庭职责及低期望值约束。

remMethod.val: con(表加强) + strain(拉紧) → 约束

words.tran: 拘泥的；被强迫的；不舒服的
勉强地；强迫地；不自然地
[数] 约束；局促，态度不自然；强制
驱使；强迫；勉强（constrain的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: To constrain someone or something means to limit their development or force them to behave in a particular way
